name: CSSStyleSheet
description: The CSSStyleSheet interface represents a single CSS style sheet. It inherits properties and methods from its parent, StyleSheet.

members.name: CSSStyleSheet.cssRules
members.description: Returns a live CSSRuleList, listing the CSSRule objects in the style sheet. This is normally used to access individual rules like this:    styleSheet.cssRules[i] // where i = 0..cssRules.length-1 To add or remove items in cssRules, use the CSSStyleSheet's deleteRule() and insertRule() methods, described below.

members.name: CSSStyleSheet.ownerRule
members.description: If this style sheet is imported into the document using an @import rule, the ownerRule property will return that CSSImportRule, otherwise it returns null.

members.name: CSSStyleSheet.deleteRule
members.description: Deletes a rule at the specified position from the style sheet.

members.name: CSSStyleSheet.insertRule
members.description: Inserts a new rule at the specified position in the style sheet, given the textual representation of the rule.
